column3: Hello there, didn’t realize there was anyone else down here.;Name’s Redgie. Red block. Big voice. Impeccable sitting abilities.;Engraving on your side says MagUnet, is that your name?;<size=8>…..</size>;You’re not much of a talker, are you?;Anyways…..help me get down from here? Any ideas?
THAT'S YOUR IDEA?!;Wait…..I can feel myself being pulled towards you.
